meanings.definition: A brand name for a herbicide containing 2,4,5-trichlorophenoxyacetic acid.
meanings.sent1: The farmer sprayed silvex on the weeds to kill them.
meanings.sent2: Silvex is effective in controlling unwanted plants in the garden.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous rabbit thought the silvex was a tasty treat!
meanings.sent4: The silvex worked like magic, making the garden look brand new.
meanings.sent5: The strong smell of silvex lingered in the air long after its application.

meanings.definition: To treat with the herbicide Silvex.
meanings.sent1: The gardener will silvex the backyard to get rid of the pesky weeds.
meanings.sent2: It is important to silvex the fields before planting new crops.
meanings.sent3: The kids pretended to silvex each other during their playtime.
meanings.sent4: She silvexed the garden with precision, ensuring no plant was left untreated.
meanings.sent5: The farmers silvex their fields every season to maintain crop health.

meanings.definition: The act of using Silvex as a herbicide.
meanings.sent1: The silvexing of the fields was necessary to protect the crops.
meanings.sent2: Silvexing requires careful planning to avoid harming beneficial plants.
meanings.sent3: The competition for the fastest silvexing time was intense among the farmers.
meanings.sent4: The fields transformed after the silvexing, looking greener and healthier.
meanings.sent5: The effectiveness of silvexing as a herbicide is well-known in the agricultural community.
